content.detailedDescription:
i have been seeing the same orb-like object reappear at he same time for a week. it just appears with no motion or sound. i just hovers for about 5 to 10 minutes, then grows dim and disappears, on sunday and monday there was a puff of smoke and the thing seemed to break up into small pieces.
 i live near ft. bliss and an air force airbase down the mountain from my house to the east. this could be some operation they are doing- but why are they doing this right over the city?
 i can see the planet venus rising to the sw at the same time this object appears, then vega and stars from the constellation cygnus appear a few minutes later. the object appears before the sky gets dark.
 i do not have a cell phone or computer at my house. my sister took a picture with her cell phone last wednesday, but i do not have access to it right now, as i'm writing this report from a public library.
content.summary: i have observed the same object reappearing at the same time for a week with varying location in the sky 30 degrees. it's there for about 5 minutes, then dissappears in a puff of smoke.

content.detailedDescription: Walking to school (very far away)
content.summary: Big silver egg came in at an angle, absorbed a bunch of plants and soil then flew straight up

content.detailedDescription: Outside sitting on a bench looking west at all the people areiving at the concert., i thought mayb it was a hologram, the lights were dimmed and not glowining.  the object was v/boomarang shaped, more v than bmrng, red dimmed lights, almost like the redeness was from the reminestant color or red that had just been on and hadnt quite faded out.  staright line travel, no sound, lost it after couldnt see the red color, it was about as big as sticking your fingers in the air and making a peace sign, mayb a little bigger, so the picture attached is exactly how dim and faded the lights appeared but red rish orange and the body of the craft was more black
content.summary: Thousands of people waiting to get i to pepsi center for concert, my says hey look up do tou see that flying v?, i look up and almost overhead a black v shaped crat with 4 red dimmed lights on each side fly right over and off towards the moutains west

content.detailedDescription: Me and my daughter we were walking our dogs in our street, near our home after dinner when we noticed this strange object in the sky, as if it were a star mooving up and down, forth and forward in a wiered manner. i realized we were seeing some kind of a strange phenomenum and asked her to please film it! she then filmed the phenomenon with her iphone until it flys away behind ths buildings. i'm very sad we can hardly see it, because it was very far from us,(it seems) but it was registered and worth what it worths. i don't know how to zoom in the video, but here it is, maybe you can do it!
content.summary: Star-like white orb moving forth and back, up and down

content.detailedDescription: Legends park explosion, a small explosion was seen at legends park niagara falls on tuesday. hundreds of witnesses heard and saw a bright blue flash from miles away, all the way to canada! people reported rattling windows and ground shaking. after the explosion which was heard no crater was found at the sight of the flash which was captured on camera. after this happened witnesses are claiming that a commercial plane was seen being escorted by a fighter jet leaving the air force base. others as far away as the fredonia foothills 90 min south saw multiple flashes from the city. after the event others have said that a similar explosion happened on october 2nd but was not published in the news or on tv. all of these stories were called in to local radio stations.
content.summary: Legends park explosion

content.detailedDescription:
Ufo sighting of pill shaped red and white cylindrical (pill shaped) object over brisbane australia, during full moon rising of october 16, 2016.  recorded on unmanned time-lapse video and later discovered upon viewing of the digital images 
(12 sequential frames from 559 600 shots).
 
initially i assumed this to be an aircraft.  several lights appear during the time-lapse (total play time of 11 seconds) – i have not yet closely examined the others.  

note: as has been the case previously when i recorded such footage - the camera (panasonic lumix fz1000 bridge camera with leica zoom lens) which was set to manual focus, mysteriously lost focus near the end of the recording, (and in one frame of this sequence) then regained focus once the object had left the area being recorded.
 
this object was descending on a steady flight path angle from left to right, as would an aircraft.  my question over this being merely a commercial aircraft, is that it doesn't appear to be a case of motion blur; rather an evenly halved red and white body.
 
also; if it was an aircraft heading from my left to my right towards brisbane international airport, from my vantage point on the west side of brisbane (about 20km from the cbd); why then do i see it as a well lit, thick cylinder instead of just what i would normally see from a conventional aircraft of wing-tip lights as it passed side-ways to my viewing perspective - not bright  lights as it would be if facing my direction?
 
i further speculate that even if it was the cabin lights from windows; it would appear on film as only a relatively thin band of white lights - not the full height of the vehicles fuselage.  also; there would be no red colour on the full side of same to leave this image as an equally distributed red and white object, and certainly would not start and end as a rounded curved shape as it does.
 
i have a good degree of photographic knowledge, as i was a professional photographer for over 30 years.
 
this is not the first unusual sighting from the same vantage point of my house - mufon has another authenticated video of mine online which i named; 
 
'ufos in australia 2016 hd' (13 feb 2016 20:33),
based on the full length video of mine 'ufo in lightning storm australia'

still frame data:
f/3.9
iso-3200
focal length 40mm
metering mode: pattern

3 of 12 original frames attached (one is out of focus) + full 11 second time lapse video
content.summary: Sighting of pill shaped red and white cylindrical (pill shaped) object over brisbane australia, during full moon rising of october 16, 2016

content.detailedDescription: Standing on deck looked like a meteor . came down like a meteor seemed to be looking at the paper mill came along the waterway to the pond the speed of a small plane speeds up stop and hovers jumps up and to right vary quick hovers again jumps up and to the right again and hovers it was doing this because of the tree tops seems to be looking at the paper mill that is all lit up at that time drops some goes back to left makes hard right turn and away from me like a meteor white lights when moving red when hovering  just one of many sightings i have had pos. abductions  from 5 yr till now but do not recall them scars scoop marks missing time mufon will to get a hold of me to give them more on these i have so many more /
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Came in like a meteor thenacross like a small plain speeds up stopes hovers jumps up and across hovers jumpes up and to right hovers drops and back hard right and leaves like a meteor tree top level  this is one of many sightings i have had over the years

content.detailedDescription: Sequential blinking lights that even made the news. local afb said nothing of theirs. videos online
content.summary: Sequential blinking lights that even made the news. local afb said nothing of theirs. videos online

content.detailedDescription:
As i walking down the road with my drink and grocery bag, a speck of light just zipped through the night sky and this just caught my attention and then it started to move in a haphazard, wavy manner and it was then i pulled out my phone to film this incident. the video i filmed is a little shaky and i might have missed out on few details when i was putting down my grocery bag. but then, i just caught an interesting phenomena, the speck of light slowly and steadily disappears into thin air and this was the end of the weird event. please find a video along with this information. 

the object disappears somewhere in near 30 seconds of the video and rest is just the night sky. there was a time when i had to put down my grocery bag during filming and phone missed few moments of the behavior.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Speck of light moving haphazardly and then slowly disappears.

content.detailedDescription: I came out of my local bible study at approx 7:45, as i turn the corner perpendicular to coast hwy, i am already looking up do to my truck going up a slight incline. then i see it. stationany, silent, stuck at a canted 45 degree angle in the sky. greens, reds, blues, and amber exterior lights that we part of a bigger object... they ran in succession streaming back and forth, left to right, kinda like the "knight rider" light... but in all colors and the width of 100s of feet. a group of 2nd 0 some odd kids in their 20's were standing on the street corner as i turned it... i asked them if the saw what i saw and they replied "yes." when i asked them how long they watched it...They said 10 min. i raced around the corner back to the church to grab my pastor, he unfortunately just locked up and left. when i raced around to see it again... it was gone..
content.summary: Like a strand of led xmas lights that streamed colors back and forth the width of more than 2 football fields

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my patio and looking up when i noticed some white lights in the sky to the northeast. they were neither particularly bright or particularly dim. at first i suspected they were from an airliner taking off from the wilmington, nc airport which lies about 10 miles north of us give or take. they were about the right size, but seemed to be moving unusually quickly for a civilian aircraft, but not super fast. as the object passed overhead i realized it was not an aircraft at all, but a triangle shaped craft with three lights at the corners and a single larger light in the center. the center light was considerably dimmer than the corner lights. the object was totally silent and as the craft moved it rotated slowly in a counter clockwise (from my perspective) direction. i couldn't tell for sure, but it looked to be about the size of a commuter jet, so maybe a little over 100 ft. stem to sterm, and flying at 5000 ft. (just a guess but i'm an aviation buff so that's probably accurate to about 2000 ft. either way.) the craft continued in a se direction before disappearing over my house. at no time did the craft change direction or altitude, it just continued in a straight line toward the ocean. i've always been skeptical of the "triangle craft" reports and wondered if they were of hysterical origin or maybe the result of the power of suggestion, but i am a sober, educated individual with some background in aviation and i know what i saw. as for how i feel, honestly i'm a little freaked out. i saw lights in the sky many years ago, but they were so far up,  i was more fascinated than anything else, and nothing has happened in the interim. i'd like to believe it's terrestrial technology of some sort. mcas new river is not too far from us, we see v-22 ospreys flying over from time to time and coast guard helicopters and the odd c-130 from elizabeth city, but who knows what the black ops guys have developed? i can tell you that what i saw, traditional aerodynamics cannot explain.
content.summary: Flying triangle

content.detailedDescription: I was outside taking pictures of the night sky because it was beautiful and in the photos i took i saw a strange object in the sky on the photo and checked my camera to make sure there wasnt anything on my lense and there was not.
content.summary: Random cluster of lights zig zaged in the air.

content.detailedDescription:
I live in the country, it was dark even though there were stars, it was approximately 4:30 am, i was letting my german shepherd out as i do about that time every morning. i looked up at the stars as i do everytime i let her out at night. i notice lights floating across the sky from an eastern direction. the object moved slowly, due west. i had the impression that the cube was huge, larger than any building in the village and was up a great distance. i am not trained to accurately give approximate size or distance. i notice red lights on each corner thus seeing the square shape. couldn't notice any type of exterior. now, as i standing there watching this strange incident, i watch the sky every night and never seen anything like this, i see a smaller red light shooting out the backside and that heads due east a a much faster speed. 
 i must add that i have found no one in fairgrove who's seen this object so there's nobody to verify what i saw. i did talk to a neighbor, a biologist, and we sort of think someone may have been testing a commercial size and type drone for maybe a delivery platform because i'm not convinced it's anything from anywhere but here. 
  i didn't know what to think because i've never seen anything like it before or since. the object emitted no sound what so ever, couldn't see the stars through what i thought would be the body, and just seem to float past. my personal feelings were, wow, what the heck is that? i didn't want to run in to get my cell phone and have it not be there when i returned. object traveled due west until out of sight.
content.summary: Middle of the night, looked up and saw a cube, a flying cube.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my wife go to this park all the time just to relax and get out of the house. we are use to seeing the night sky from this park which has a very good view of the land scape for miles. on this particular night as we are standing there we were looking to the east and a car pulled up behind us to the west. we turned around to see who the people were pulling in and when we turned back around there was a large bright light just sitting there in the sky so bright it lit up the landscape for miles. this park is on 23rd & topping in kansas city. and you can see all the way out to the sports complex where arrowhead and royal stadiums are at in raytown a suburb of kc. the light was so bright it lit up the park from out there in raytown. we sit there and watch it for about 4 or 5 minutes before i got the thought to get my cellphone out of the car and film it. by the time i ran to my car and came back it had turned the bright light out but was still lit up enough to see very clearly. this was the first of a collection of sightings that took place over the next 2 weeks. i have posted 4 videos on you tube which you can look up under willis clark's ufo video files. one where we were on the top level of a casino parking garage and you can actually see one take off from the ground and on the same video. one flew right over us and we thought that one was an airplane because it made noise like a jet or something until it flew off in the distance and posted up in the sky and sit perfectly still. and that night there was a fleet of these craft all over different parts of the kansas city sky. some so high in the sky they look like stars. one thing is for sure though ... these were not airplanes or choppers. actually one day, a couple of days before, when we were on the way to the same place we made the video of one taking off, we saw one flying along the highway we were on. close enough to see very clearly with out field glasses and we could see very clearly the size and shape of this craft and it look like nothing i've ever seen before but i couldn't get video because i was driving and my wife does not know how to use the phone video camera. but this craft flew along the path of the highway we were on for a few mile and then accelerated super fast ahead of us at a tremendous speed.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: My wife and myself were standing under the park shelter looking at the lights across the landscape when suddenly this glowing light appeared sitting dead still in the sky. it set ther for a few minutes and the flew over us going from the east sky to west

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were in my parents backyard watching the stars and talking. we witnessed what i would call a bar shaped craft traveling above us. i cant tell how high, how large or how fast it was moving as we had no frame of reference and it was nearly directly over us when we first saw it. we both saw it at the same time. it was a cloudless night and was approximately around the date of the perseid meteor shower. 

it traveled in a straight line, from approximately north north west to south south east. it made no noise, did not speed up or slow down nor did it seem to emit any light other than to simply glow slightly. it was mainly translucent as we could see the star field behind it, but not clearly, almost as if light was bending around it. 

it struck me as odd because it was flying with the least possible aerodynamic shape, instead of the front being the smallest point, it flew edge on. there were no exhaust contrails or any emissions of any kind. 

i am an amateur astronomer and aviation enthusiast and i can say this did not match any aircraft known to me. 

at the same time we saw this, we both got a very strange feeling i can only describe as "eerie/creepy"? 

it was only visible for about 1 - 2 minutes before we lost sight of it.
content.summary: Bar shaped, translucent but not transparent. silent

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work about 3:30 am aprox.Oct 28 2007 .I was headed north on blue ridge cutoff and turned right onto blue ridge blvd. about the 3rd house on left there was a ham radio antenna.Right on top was a triangular shaped ufo.Hoving right on top of antenna.I pulled over for a few seconds.It was black with no n numbers.I thought at first it might be attached to the antenna.However the antenna was not bending.I continued down blue ridge blvd.Towards my house.It was facing in westward direction.When i got to the corner of blue ridge blvd. and cedar ave. there was a second one hovering just above treetop on cedar ave. which was a few feet north of my car which was headed east.I pulled to the side to observe the object.It triangular just like the first one. it was just hovering in a stationary position.Both were black in color and appeared to be made of stealth composite type material.It was complete triangular not like f-22 which has some other shapes on edge.I sat there in my car for about 20 min. watching it.The bottom was smooth.After looking at bottom for about 10 minutes i noticed a couple of very faint circular areas which i assume were where landing gear was.The object did not move up or down at all the whole time i was watching.I was trying to figure out how it was able to hover.Finnally i rolled down my window and listened to see if i could here something.I was barely able to hear anything but what sounded like an engine reviving at extremely high rpm.The thing would not move while i was sitting there so i decided to circle the block to get a different view.By the time i circled the block it was moving in a westerly slightly north direction at about approximately 25 or 30 miles per hour at same height as it was hovering.Approx.30 feet off ground.I could not see a cockpit of any kind from my angles of view.It was not a helicopter.I hope this info helps you.I lived in this area most of my life.When younger we would see strange objects in sky darting around over the sugar creek oil refinery. take care
content.summary: 2 triangular shaped objects hovering

content.detailedDescription: Flying over southern spain my wife and i saw a huge red globe 35000 ft in the sky the globe was approx half a mile wide then i presume the pilot saw it and banked violentley to the left until we were away from it
content.summary: Red orange huge glowing red globe possibly half a mile wide

content.detailedDescription:
Between poreè and novigrad – end of july (not sure about the concrete date, maybe between 18th and 29th) 2011, between 9 and 11 p. m.
i was just watching sunset but i sat on the beach for a long time... it was too late, the sky was dark when i lookd a little bit more left and "that thing" was there. i wasn´t able to think about what was that...
triangular shape, 3 lighting points (yellow), weird moves. 9 – 11 p. m. 
i sat on the beach and for 15 or 20 minutes stared at that “thing” over the sea. few minutes it was just “hangin´” on one place, then it started to move really weird way (and the speed of those moves was unbelievable), but still was the triangular shape. 
i don´t remember how it disappeared, i was like hypnotized… i looked aroud to see, if there´s anyone who see the same "thing" and when i looked back, "that thing" wasn´t there... 
there were many people on the beach, i´m sure, someone saw the same…

i´m sorry i have no photos – like i said, i was like hypnotized and wasn´t thinkin´ about taking photos (and if i would, i´m sure it wouldn´t work – my cell phone in that time had very bad camera).
content.summary: Three lighting points in the triangular shape over the adriatic sea between poreè and novigrad

content.detailedDescription:
I stepped out of my apartment at approximately 9pm and noticed a single white light near the horizon (sxse) - about 30 deg. i noticed the object was very slow moving because i could see two stars behind it in the background. i didn't pay a great deal of attention to the object at first because i'm quite familiar with the air traffic in the area, particularly the frequent border patrol helicopters and the international flight traffic. 

however, about 5 minutes later (after retrieving a few things from my truck) i noticed the object had moved a little closer and was easier to view (by this time the object was at about 45 from the horizon. this time i noticed because (despite appearing at a high altitude) i could clearly see the light and there was no strobe what-so-ever. i pulled out my phone and began recording the object. 

i observed that he object was moving slower than a normal aircraft. during the entire time i kept looking for the strobe or even the silhouette of the aircraft. no once did i see any strobe nor could i see a silhouette of the object.

the object was not traveling in a straight line. it was making a large circle. i observed this object for at least a half hour or more. i observed the object make at least 3 large circles. my best estimation is this object made a circle of at least a 5-7 mile radius. i shot a pretty good video of this object for a considerable amount of time and the object never seemed to deviate from it's circular path. i eventually had to go inside because the mosquitos were eating me alive!!!



a few things you should know about me...
as a uscg vet i'm a trained observer.
as a former private investigator, i'm a trained observer.
i'm very well versed in all forms of aircraft from civialian to military, and even drone tech.
i've been flying radio controlled aircraft for 20 years.
i'm a certified contest director with the american modelers academy - i know drones!!!
i'm a drone pilot instructor!

while i cannot identify what i saw, i do know it wasn't a registered aircraft. it had no silhouette, it produced no noise, it had no strobes. it couldn't be a civil drone as it's flight time was too long and it's flight path and height was much too distant . i seriously doubt this was a military drone because the border patrol doesn't illuminate their night drones (i've seen the border patrol drones at night (juxtaposed against the moon).

another note... i went on youtube on several occasions and discovered that i'm not the only person to object and record this type of object. it seems this type of object and event is a fairly common occurrence in hidalgo county.
i have several videos of this object (all sequential)  and i'm uploading the primary one for now. i can upload the rest at your request.
content.summary: High altitude single white light making flying in a large circle pattern - no strobes or sound

content.detailedDescription:
- observed late afternoon between 3pm and 4pm
- watching tv, getting ready to prepare dinner
- didn't actually notice the object at the time, later noticed it while viewing the photo
- from the photo just appeared to be a meltalic object
- felt somewhat shocked

content.detailedDescription:
Was out doors feeding feral animals in back yard sometime after nine p.M.  was talking to them as i fed them and heard a noise in the sky somewhere in the sky above which sounded mixed between metal screeching or tearing and mixed with something breaking the sound barrier.  it happened twice, the second time i didn't continue to ignore it and went out front to see a bright orb in the sky just to the south west over the nevada desert.  while i didn't have my glasses on i could see sparkles emanating from the object which at that time i couldn't tell rather it was coming towards me or away from me.
i watched it for about five minutes before i decided to go into the house and get my cell phone to record it.
by the time i got back out doors it had stopped making nosies and sparkling.  could be it had just traveled further than my hearing could hear.
i began a two minute recording above the buildings to my west.
the slightly orange square in the lower part of the screed is one of my neighbors bathroom windows.
as you can see it remained in the sky for some time.
i recorded only two minutes of it and since it wasn't behaving erratic, meaning making noises or sparkles i decided not to record anymore.
the internet didn't show any other sightings for about an hour, but the odd thing is that their sighting didn't seem to fit the direction mine did.
if it was a rocket coming into the atmosphere, that would explain the metallic noise but only if it was close enough to be heard if it was breaking up and it didn't appear to be that close.
still have no idea what it was but as you can see, the colorado river is directly before me and the orb was directly south west and heading west.
in the internet articles they reported it crossing the sky across las vegas, so this either turned northwards about a hundred miles or they were two objects in the sky.
the other reports came in from phoenix and that one would have been in alignment to the one i saw if it was heading west but again the videos of the one in phoenix appear to show an object not like mine, heading north west, not south west.  
who knows??
content.summary: Went outdoors shortly after nine to feed outdoor feral animals.  while i was in the back heard terrible nosies and coming out front saw bright orb in sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was attending a football game at about 6:30 pm.  looked to the eastern sky and noticed 3 orange lights that were way too high to be part of a building.  the flashing of the lights seemed sequential it went from 3 lights to 5 when i looked away it had faded completely away.  no sound was associated there was not enough time for me to notify anyone but i did tell my wife about the sighting then when we arrived home there was a story about other sightings and a video that was identical to the lights that i had seen.  this sighting took place significantly south of the lights shown in the video that was filmed in phoenix my sighting was in eloy, az about 45 miles south of phoenix.
content.summary: Five or so orange lights flashed in sequence became bright then faded out not moving in any direction

content.detailedDescription: Just had solar panels installed, topmost branches in weeping willow tree causing shade on panels.  went on roof to target which branches to cut.  attempted filming tree for later viewing.  reviewed video and was surprised what i saw.  a floating something that does not move inrelation to came or other influence.
content.summary: Anomaly from iphone video

content.detailedDescription: Outside cloud less. shiny metal notice it was huge. watch for ten minutes. no movement at all and after that day i was sick and quite a few of people was sick.Only thing i said was i see you up there. and i stopped watching.
content.summary: Long ovel shaped like a cats pupil  or a poisonous snake eye. bout 1 mile wide and about 7miles long

content.detailedDescription: We were at a stoplight and looked out the window to our left and said what is that. a craft was hovering over a mall parking lot. it slowly lifted straight up and slowly flew across the street then took off a little faster headed north.
content.summary: It hovered over the mall then slowly traveled across the street then turned left and headed north.

content.detailedDescription: I was stopped eastbound at the stop light at cirque/56th st west. i was the second car in the right hand lane coming from cirque/56th st w. out of the corner of my eye i noticed a silver circle flying ne across the street above the am/pm and continuing se on above the nursing home and the apartments on the opposite corner that i was stopped at. at first i thought it was a huge silver balloon but, it flew in a straight path against a breeze we had blowing at the time. the flags at the texaco stations were flying to the north and the object was moving at a steady pace in a southward direction. it is also noted that this was a clear, cool; crisp morning at approximately 10:10 am. the object was silver in color and changed from a circle to an oval shape. it was a solid object and you could see an outline, but at the same time could see the object change shape. there were lights that were grayish/white that blinked around the center half of the craft. when i held my finger up to the sky while i was sitting at the stoplight my index finger didn't cover the whole object. i watched it fly for sometime, but the blinking was random, meaning i saw no discerning pattern. when my light changed i made a right turn from cirque/56th on to south orchard st. i followed the object for about two miles and i lost of it in traffic.  i have included a picture from google earth showing the intersection i was at.
content.summary: Silver circle changing to oval with grey/white blinking light

content.detailedDescription: red glowing light. i initially though it to be the top of a tower or something of that nature in the distance.  the object then began to change direction rapidly left to right. it then would drop from sky and disappear. it would then re appear and move rapidly. this was near the vla dishes on route 60. these maneuvers were not done by man. this object was far too agile for that.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Red circular light that changed direction rapidly, drop from sky then disappear and reappear

content.detailedDescription: I was outside having a cigarette with my wife looking into the sky like we do every night we go outside in the night. we're always trying to find shooting stars in the sky and all of a sudden a rectangle like abject with white like circles under the flying object and made no noise and had no light. when i saw it i pointed it out to my wife and she caught a quick view at it before it flew in a direction of trees no longer seeing it.I didn't see wings and it not having light or sound made it very creepy.
content.summary: Almost square with triangle top white circles under it.Moving with no sound at all and no light i have good eye site so i can see it better then my wife did but it was not a plane and was big enough for a person.
